Document.Focus: Prenatal care in your first trimester

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Prenatal care in your first trimester
QAPair.Answer: Trimester means "3 months." A normal pregnancy lasts around 10 months and has 3 trimesters. The word prenatal means before birth. The first trimester starts when your baby is conceived. It continues through week 14 of your pregnancy. Your health care provider may talk about your pregnancy in weeks, rather than in months or trimesters.
